mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TYPE = #{type}
AND ANSWER IS NOT NULL
AND ANSWER IS NULL
ORDER BY ${sortField} ${sortOrder} NULLS LAST
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BO_NO, ME_NO, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{meNo}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME,B.TITLE,B.CONTENT,B.INSERT_TIME,B.ANSWER FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON M.ME_NO = B.ME_NO WHERE B.TYPE =#{type} ORDER BY INSERT_TIME DESC
